Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Grand, Laramie, North Ave, & Central due to police activity near Central/Bloomingdale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Grand, Laramie, North Ave., and Central due to police activity near Central/Bloomingdale.
